::Megatron X::

The Dragon stalked into the deep woods, hoping to find more faw flesh, that's 
what kept his spark from extunguishing. He saw a trail of bones and dead 
flesh. Never would he become a scavenger. Always a Predator. He picked up a 
piece of dead flesh and picked it up with his spiked tongue. He smelled 
Autobots, no, Maximals were what he smelled. Maximals? He questioned himself. 
He wanted alive flesh. He wanted pulsating Maximal Sparks. He.....

"What the hell?!" He roared. He now knew. He was a Decepticon. He was 
Megatron. No, he was now Megatron X. He still he a hunger for Maximals. He 
must find them. He must eat them alive.
